name: The Chalice Ritual
description:
WARNING: The HTML build broke the UI, so please download the .zip. Sorry for the inconvenience :(

  • Use WASD to move
  • Left-Click to pick cards up / Let go of cards
  • "Mouse-Wheel" to move picked up cards closer and further away

Play cards by moving them above the chalice and dropping them. Try to beat the power level of the Skeleton's Challice by using your cards. As soon as all cards are used the winner will be defined.
